search_result.link_content_summary:
{
"Summary": "The House of Raeford Flock is a nonprofit outreach program that partners with charitable organizations to responsibly distribute resources to help meet the needs in communities where House of Raeford Farms has operations. The program began in 2010 with the mission to make a positive difference in people's lives. House of Raeford employees and local citizens volunteer their time to support the program's four pillars of focus: hunger relief, youth development, mental illness, and addiction recovery.",
"Company Name": "House of Raeford Farms",
"Email": "partner@flockcares.org",
"Phone Number": "877-256-5690",
"Address": "None",
"Product Information": "None",
"Representative": "None",
"Useful Information": "- House of Raeford Flock has partnered with nonprofit organizations in Georgia, Louisiana, North Carolina, and South Carolina.\n\n\n- House of Raeford and its employees have donated hundreds of thousands of pounds of products to food pantries and feeding programs and millions of dollars to support hunger relief, youth development, addiction recovery, mental illness, after-school mentoring for inner city youth, snacks for impoverished children in local schools, music scholarships for gifted young people in need, and encouragement and practical assistance for battered women striving to regain their independence."
}

search_total_info:
- Buyer overview
Company Name: House of Raeford Farms, Inc.
Representative: Robert Johnson
Product: Poultry processing
Website: www.houseofraeford.com 

- Buyer's recent activities 
Product info : The company sells fresh and further processed chicken products.. House of Raeford Farms offers a variety of chicken products, including fresh chicken, further processed chicken, and branded products. They also provide recipes and cooking tips on their website.. Fresh chicken
Further processed chicken
House of Raeford
Speedy Bird
Filet of Chicken. Whole Wheat Chicken Corn Dogs, Halloween Party For Kids, Southwest Chicken Dip, Shaker Salad – Citrus Soy Chicken & Bulgur Wheat, Cilantro Lime Chicken Breasts With Quinoa & Black Beans. - Fresh Chicken
- Further Processed Chicken. The webpage does not provide any product information. 
Useful info : - House of Raeford Farms is a family-owned and operated business with generations of experience in the poultry industry.
- They are committed to providing high-quality chicken products to their customers, while also being mindful of their environmental and social responsibilities.
- Their website showcases their products, recipes, and news, and provides information about their commitment to sustainability and employee well-being.. - House of Raeford Flock has partnered with nonprofit organizations in Georgia, Louisiana, North Carolina, and South Carolina.


- House of Raeford and its employees have donated hundreds of thousands of pounds of products to food pantries and feeding programs and millions of dollars to support hunger relief, youth development, addiction recovery, mental illness, after-school mentoring for inner city youth, snacks for impoverished children in local schools, music scholarships for gifted young people in need, and encouragement and practical assistance for battered women striving to regain their independence.. - The company does not use growth hormones or steroids in their chicken products.
- They are not genetically modified.
- They use No Antibiotics Ever (NAE) in their chicken production.
- Their chicken products are gluten-free and do not contain MSG.
- The company provides various recipes for their chicken products on their website.
